Automatic CSS layout based on language direction

Using modern CSS like Flexbox, Grid and CSS logical properties and values like: margin-inline-start and margin-inline-end for automatic correct alignment based on the HTML dir -attribute.

Note the placement of the container, borders and CTA-buttons in the English LTR and Arabic RTL version
